name: Chopter Pop
description:
Made for the GMTK2020 Game Jam. The theme was Out of Control. My game fits the theme because once the player launches the spinning chopter they don't have control over it anymore.

Game objective: Aim and launch the spinning chopter to pop circles, get points and refresh your ability to launch.

Default Controls (also shown in-game):

H to show main screen
N to clear saved High Score
WASD / Arrow Keys to aim
Spacebar to Launch
R to restart / replay

Types of Circles
Yellow Circle = 10 points
Orange Circle = 20 points
Enemy (Grey Circle) = 3 points
Purple Circle = 50 points and refresh your ability to launch

Popping circles in quick succession gets you bonus points.
